hjb.msg.valuecopiers
Interface EncodedValueCopier

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseEncodedValueCopier
public interface EncodedValueCopier

EncodedValueCopier defines the methods used to read and write encoded values to or from JMS Messages

Author:
Tim Emiola

Method Summary
 void addToMessage(String name, String encodedValue, Message message)
          Adds a property or message field named name encoded as value to a JMS Message.
 boolean canBeEncoded(String name, Message message)
          Examines message to see if it has property named name corresponding to the type this TypePropertyConverter is responsible for handling.
 String getAsEncodedValue(String name, Message message)
          Examines message and retrieves the property named name corresponding to the type this TypePropertyConverter handles.
 TypedValueCodec getCodec()
           
 

Method Detail

addToMessage

public void addToMessage(String name,
                         String encodedValue,
                         Message message)
                  throws HJBException
Adds a property or message field named name encoded as value to a JMS Message.

Parameters:
name - a name of property or field in message
encodedValue - a value contained in the name field
message - a Message to be updated with the field's decoded value
Throws:
HJBException - if name is an illegal JMS field, or if value cannot be correctly decoded by this TypePropertyConverter.

canBeEncoded

public boolean canBeEncoded(String name,
                            Message message)
                     throws HJBException
Examines message to see if it has property named name corresponding to the type this TypePropertyConverter is responsible for handling.

Parameters:
name - a possible name of a property in the message
message -
Returns:
true if the name property exists in message and can be returned encoded as the type corresponding to this TypedValueCodec, false otherwise.
Throws:
HJBException - if a problem occurs while examining message

getAsEncodedValue

public String getAsEncodedValue(String name,
                                Message message)
                         throws HJBException
Examines message and retrieves the property named name corresponding to the type this TypePropertyConverter handles.

Parameters:
name - a possible name of a property in the message
message -
Returns:
null if the name property does not exist in this message, otherwise, the HJB encoded value of the property.
Throws:
HJBException - if a problem occurs while examining message, or if the property can not be encoded as the type corresponding to this TypedValueCodec.

getCodec

public TypedValueCodec getCodec()
Returns:
the TypePropertyCodec used to by the EncodedValueCopier instance, if any is used.
